about.title: Process Development Engineer
about.description: Process Development Engineer specializing in green hydrogen production. I enhance process capability by developing scalable manufacturing processes, integrating cutting-edge technology, and applying data analysis to optimize production efficiency.

skills.title: My Technical Expertise
skills.description: With a background in Mechanical Engineering and years of experience in process development, I bring a diverse skill set that combines engineering principles with data-driven approaches to optimize manufacturing processes.

processDevelopment.title: Process Development
processDevelopment.description: Developing scalable manufacturing processes for green hydrogen production using statistical tools like DOE and SPC.

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.description: Applying large-data analysis in SaaS environments to optimize process efficiency and support continuous improvement initiatives.

manufacturingSystems.title: Manufacturing Systems
manufacturingSystems.description: Building robust data architectures for real-time data storage and visualization to enhance project management capabilities.

cadDesign.title: CAD & Engineering Design
cadDesign.description: Generating structured CAD designs and quality-focused drawings using PDM systems for improved design accuracy and efficiency.

technicalSkills.title: Technical Skills
technicalSkills.description: Proficient in CAD, SolidWorks, Python, SQL, Data Analysis, Machine Learning, Product Design, and Project Management.

description.processEngineer1: Enhanced process capability by 20% for green hydrogen production by developing scalable manufacturing processes.
description.processEngineer2: Integrated cutting-edge technology into production processes by working with suppliers and vendors.
description.processEngineer3: Improved decision-making and stakeholder communication by providing actionable recommendations.
description.processEngineer4: Developed robust data architectures for real-time data storage and visualization.
description.manufacturingEngineer1: Enhanced product lifecycle management by 20% utilizing hands-on machining and efficient feedback mechanisms.
description.manufacturingEngineer2: Reduced development iterations by 30% through collaboration with the R&D team.
description.manufacturingEngineer3: Achieved 95% quality control compliance by analyzing production units against standards.
description.manufacturingEngineer4: Facilitated cross-functional transformation in manufacturing processes.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Interested in discussing process development, manufacturing efficiency, or potential opportunities? I'd love to connect.

career.title: My Career Path
career.description: With experience spanning multiple companies and roles, I've developed expertise in process development, manufacturing engineering, and project management across various industries.
